thread.title: WATCH: Leicester City's Demarai Gray Score Brilliant Solo Goal
thread.title_full: WATCH: Leicester City's Demarai Gray Score Brilliant Solo Goal

title: WATCH: Leicester City's Demarai Gray Score Brilliant Solo Goal
text:
WATCH: Leicester City's Demarai Gray Score Brilliant Solo Goal Wed Feb 08 2017 22:33:54   22:33:54 GMT+0000 (GMT) Nasir Jabbar Nasir Jabbar in football 
Demarai Gray churned out a brilliant performance as he helped steer Leicester City into the next round of the FA Cup. 
Following their draw at Pride Park, they met tonight in the replay with the Premier League side eventually progressing. 
But it took them 120 minutes to do so. (Gray reels away in celebration following his brilliant solo goal) 
Leicester and Derby were leveled one-a-piece heading into extra-time, though goals from Wilfried Ndidi and Gray secured the win. 
And both goals were stunning. From Ndidi's long-range piledriver to Gray's mazy run and goal. 
Gray skipped past Keogh and Vydra inside the box before smashing the ball into the top corner. Check it out below: Brilliant piece of individual skill. Demarai gray take a bow. :clap::fire: ( @22Demarai ) pic.twitter.com/T1zp48taHI - Lets Rant LCFC (@letsrantlcfc) February 8, 2017 Demarai Gray, muhteşem golüyle skoru belirledi. #FACupTivibuda pic.twitter.com/WgHHZDJ0YU
